mapper.sql: PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, ZJBWDM, ZJLXDM, XDHWDM, XYDM, XXZLDF, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME
mapper.select:
select f.*,d1.name as zjbwmc,d2.name as zjlxmc,u1.USER_NAME as creagteName,u2.USER_NAME as updateName from LEDEN_COLLECT_FOOTPRINT f left join SYS_DICT_LIST d1 on d1.sign='DICT_ZJBW' and f.ZJBWDM= d1.code left join SYS_DICT_LIST d2 on d2.sign='DICT_ZJLX' and f.ZJLXDM= d2.code left join SYS_USER u1 on u1.USER_CODE= f.CREATE_USER_ID left join SYS_USER u2 on u2.USER_CODE= f.UPDATE_USER_ID
where f.PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into LEDEN_COLLECT_FOOTPRINT (PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, ZJBWDM, ZJLXDM, XDHWDM, XYDM, XXZLDF, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME, ZJSJ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjbwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjlxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdhwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xxzldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zjsj,jdbcType=BLOB})
